div.head: 陰腎痛
div.div: yin[-member i.e. penis and] kidneys [i.e. testicles] pain

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: yin[-member i.e. penis and] kidneys [i.e. testicles] pain

sense.def: Illness Sign of scrotal pain. Pu ji fang 普濟方 249: 治猝陰腎痛，以燒牛屎末，和酒敷之 , “To cure sudden yin[-member, i.e. penis, and] kidneys [i.e. testicles] pain , apply a powder of burned cow dung mixed with wine to the [painful region]”.
